original_title: 楽しいウイロータウン
overview: Bully the Weasel and Scurry the Ermine live in Wild Wood, the dark forest outside of Willow Town. Both Bully and Scurry will try every trick to get Willow Town for themselves. However, our heroes, Ratty the Water Rat and his shy friend Mollie the Mole with the help of their other animal friends, are able to overcome any attempt to take Willow Town.
title: Willow Town
